name: BSO
comment:
>>37767342

"Where'd you find the gem, Nel?" You ask.

"There," He gestures to the ceiling. "By the chandelier."

"Mm..." Doesn't seem like there's any uniformity. They could be anywhere, and whoever beat you here seems to have taken up art thievery. You motion to the Writ Keepers' leader as you heft the washed-out painting off the wall. "Ayla, think this painting means anything?"

"Anything that depicts the surface so clearly might have meaning." She suggests. "I'm not sure if it's worth much, though. It looks pretty damaged; whoever beat us here just sort of glazed over it."

"Hold onto it for now. Don't worry, our UIs can hold a lot."

You dig around in the room, but don't seem to find a whole lot of anything else. Ayla stashes a few more books. Tatsumaki seems awfully bored.

> See what the other party's up to.
> Challenge the Obsidian Pegasus.
